title: Mansion Escape in the English Countryside
description: Escape the city and experience a quintessential English getaway in the Buckinghamshire countryside. Only 30 minutes from central London but far away from the bustle, De Vere Latimer Estate is the ultimate getaway nestled amid vibrant rolling hills and quaint country towns. Enjoy a relaxing stay with daily continental breakfast, a decadent Ã  la carte dinner for two and an afternoon tea for two.

title: Mansion Escape in the English Countryside
description: Escape the city and experience a quintessential English getaway in the Buckinghamshire countryside. Only 30 minutes from central London but far away from the bustle, De Vere Latimer Estate is the ultimate getaway nestled amid vibrant rolling hills and quaint country towns. Enjoy a three, four or five-night stay with daily continental breakfast, a decadent a la carte dinner for two and an afternoon tea for two.
